text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

I'm glad we could properly enjoy the after-festival...
Thank you for bringing Meguru back, Mano.
Uh, no, it's not like that...

Meguru,
thank you for giving it your all too.

Hehe... I had to be somewhat useful!
It wouldn't make sense if I came back for nothing, right?

Ah... sorry...
I didn't really think about the meaning or anything...

Meguru-chan has so many amazing qualities, but...
it's not about that... um...

It's not about how amazing Meguru-chan is,
it's because I like Meguru-chan.

Even if it doesn't make sense,
I just want to be by your side...

Me, Meguru...!? What's wrong...
Did I say something bad...!?
No, no... it's nothing...

What's wrong?
Hmm, sorry, I wonder why...

It's nothing
But still... why...

It won't stop...
I'm sorry... I'm sorry...
Meguru-chan... / Meguru...
Is it okay if I hug you for a moment...?
Mano and Hiori, we finally caught them...
